name: Boulder Rush (itch)
description:
This game was made as a project for a Game Development Fundamentals course. This game was made free, and always will be free. This game will however, never receive any updates.

Assets used:

Loop & Music Free by marching dream

FREE Casual Game SFX Pack by Dustyroom

Create with Code | Prototype 4 - Sumo Battle by Unity Education

Stylized Astronaut by PULSAR BYTES

LowPoly Environment Pack by Korveen
